name: Game Jam 24/10 Submission
description:
Team: Jack Aitken, Jack Edgar, Adam Hughes: Programmers, Martin Ng: Artist, Jack Hulme: Sound Designer, John Ferry: Designer.  

Play as your favorite revolutionaries from across history as they duke it out on spinning tops and try and push each other off a continuously shrinking stage. Play as many famous figures, not limited to: Gandhi, William Wallace and Prince, and claim dominance over your opponents.
